mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, name, card_number, card_type, expired_month, expired_year, cvv, is_default, created_at, updated_at FROM payment_method WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY is_default DESC, updated_at DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT last_insert_rowid()
INSERT INTO payment_method (user_id, name, card_number, card_type, expired_month, expired_year, cvv, is_default, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{cardNumber}, #{cardType}, #{expiredMonth}, #{expiredYear}, #{cvv}, #{isDefault}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE payment_method SET name = #{name}, card_number = #{cardNumber}, card_type = #{cardType}, expired_month = #{expiredMonth}, expired_year = #{expiredYear}, cvv = #{cvv}, is_default = #{isDefault}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE payment_method SET is_default = 0, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE payment_method SET is_default = 1, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND id = #{id}
